response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which holds immense value for us and has been meticulously designed to meet your specific needs. We believe its worth extends far beyond its tangible aspects, making it an invaluable asset for you. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, we are extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time only, we are offering this remarkable product at a special price of $1,100,000. This is a unique opportunity to secure such a high-value item at a price that is significantly below its market value. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer, and we will be happy to guide you through the process. We look forward to the possibility of working together and bringing this product to enhance your business or personal endeavors.", "product_price": 1100000}
